title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
EB: When clicking on the first Combo, it should take focus.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the application 
2. Locate the first Combo 
3. Click on the first Combo 
Expected result: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on.
